name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程著重於高級聽力與口說能力之培養，使學生之聽講能力訓練進階至主題式的學習. 教材提昇至多元化之主題，包括商業、貿易、法律、政治、社會、文化、觀光等層面。教法上強調生動的多媒體輔助與高效的演練，針對以上教材主題，訓練學生聽取他人語言意涵及口語表達能力。此外，希望藉由此訓練，培養學生學習的策略，進而對自我學習產生負責的態度。
schedule:
1		Introduction
2		No class: Feb. 28 Holiday
3		4 animal intelligence
4		4 animal intelligence
5		5 longevity
6		5 longevity
7		No Class: April 4 Tomb-Sweeping Day
8		5 longevity
9		Pair Video Contest
10		6 giving to others
11		6 giving to others
12		7 what’s the use of homework
13		7 what’s the use of homework
14		8 sit-down meal
15		8 sit-down meal
16		9 finding a niche
17		Group Video Project Due & Contest
18		Wrap-up
scorePolicy:
1 Weekly (surprise) Tests 70 %; 2 Participation & Video Projects (pair and group) 30 %
*There will be surprise assignments /quizzes to check your participation throughout the semester.
